#include <algorithm>
#include <cassert>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cstring>
#include <deque>
#include <iomanip>
#include <iostream>
#include <map>
#include <queue>
#include <set>
#include <stack>
#include <string>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

#define sd(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sfd(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sfld(x) scanf("%lld",&x
#define pf printf

#define LL long long
#define ll long long
#define LD long double
#define ld long double
#define PB push_back
#define pb push_back
#define MP make_pair
#define mp make_pair
#define F first
#define S second

#define pii pair<int,int>
#define vi vector<int>
#define fr(i,n) for( int i=0; i<=n; i++)
#define frm(i,m,n) for(int i=m; i<=n; i++)
#define N 200000

pair<ll,ll> p[5001];

ll arr[10001];

int main(){

    ll t;

    cin>>t;

    while(t--){


        ll n,q;

        cin>>n>>q;

        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){

            cin>>p[i].first>>p[i].second;
        }

        for(int i=0;i<q;i++){

            cin>>arr[i];

            int flag=0;

            for(int j=0;j<n;j++){

                if(arr[i]>=p[j].first && arr[i]<=p[j].second){

                    flag=1;
                    break;
                }
            }

            if(flag) cout<<"NO\n";

            else cout<<"YES\n";
        }

        ///sort(p,p+n);

        ///sort(arr,arr+q);

        /*int idx = 0;


        for(int i=0;i<q;){


            if(arr[i]<p[idx].first){

                cout<<"YES\n";
                i++;
            }

            else if(arr[i]>=p[idx].first && arr[i]<=p[idx].second) {

                cout<<"NO\n";
                i++;
            }

            else if(arr[i]>p[idx].second){

                idx++;
            }
        }*/
    }
}
